Text.Page:
Not that we're taking this war personally, but I want to hurt the argons as much as possible.

I've ordered {@LinkCreature:248#3003#Vikhonul} to identify the argon commanders. Your job is to take them out.

Kalkzak wanted targets, so I give you targets.

The three argons I marked for death are responsible for multiple atrocities against federation forces.

This isn't vengeance, it's justice.

You got {@LinkCreature:48#25#Baruldur}! Great work.

Our morale needed a boost like this. Long live the Shariar!

{@LinkCreature:48#27#Nauti}'s dead! Great work.

Our morale needed a boost like this. Long live the Shariar!

You killed {@LinkCreature:48#28$$Mogmolor}! Great work.

Our morale needed a boost like this. Long live the Shariar!
